text.__SUMMARY__: Odostomia hendersoni is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Description: The shell grows to a length of 3.3 mm.
text.Distribution:
This species occurs in the following locations:
North West Atlantic
text.Notes:
Additional information regarding this species:
Distribution: Range: 41.5°N to 26°N; 82°W to 70.7°W. Distribution: USA: Massachusetts to North Carolina
